txt.en: 'Can you believe all of these goblins? You are a brave and skilled [placeholder], so it will be nothing to you to thin their numbers a bit. We have got to start somewhere.\n\n'Be careful, friend. I do not like the looks of this place. The goblins seem more organized than usual.'
'That was a good start, [placeholder]! I thank you for your assistance in making these halls safer for our expedition.'
'There is something unusually bad about Gazatmur. I do not like the way the goblins seem so organized in their movements.'
Goblins have infested Gazatmur in alarming numbers and pose a great threat to the Dolven-view camp.
Goblins can be found in Gazatmur, a large area in the east of the Great Delving.\n\nYou should defeat many goblins at Gazatmur to thin their numbers.
Return to Wigfast at his hiding spot
Wigfast is at his hiding spot near Gazatmur, the goblin-encampment of the eastern Great Delving.\n\nYou should return to Wigfast now that you have thinned the goblins' ranks.
